name: Spaceship Warlock
overview: Spaceship Warlock is an adventure game created by Mike Saenz and Joe Sparks. The game was released in 1991 for the Macintosh and in 1994 for Windows. The game features arcade action and interactive dialogue, which enables the player to type whatever he chose. It was graphically ahead of its time and acquired a cult following. The game is a first person adventure set in a sci-fi future, in which the protagonist is captured by space pirates led by Captain Hammer, whom he ultimately joins. The protagonist, namely, the player of the game, then goes on to battle and ultimately overthrow the evil Kroll empire and restore freedom to the galaxy.
